summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2276 for the improvement of the Alley in Block One (1), Sarah A. Bell's Addition to The City of Seattle, all in The City of Seattle, being the alley from Olive Street to Westlake Avenue, and between Fourth Avenue and Fifth Avenue, by paving the same with vitrified brick laid upon a proper concrete foundation, and providing for the necessary surface drainage; under Ordinance No. 23443, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
